Stanfield BA ,

Chouljenko VN , et al. A single intramuscular vaccination of mice with the HSV‐1 VC2 virus with mutations in the glycoprotein K and the membrane protein UL20 confers full protection against lethal intravaginal challenge with virulent HSV‐1 and HSV‐2 strains. PLoS ONE. 2014; 9( 10): e109890. 25350288
